languages.text: {n}На лице Калькасара нет и тени ненависти или разочарования.{/n} "А ведь у вас были такие перспективы. Впрочем, я грешу на вашу наследственность... Прощайте, {name}. Обещаю, что каждое посеянное вами семя скверны будет найдено и искоренено. Свита, ликвидировать приговоренного еретика".

{n}There is not a shred of hatred or disappointment on Calcazar's face.{/n} "And you showed such promise, too. I blame your heredity... Farewell, {name}. I vow to find and destroy every single seed of corruption you have sown." {n}He glances at his retinue.{/n} "Execute the heretic."
languages.original_text: {n}На лице Калькасара нет и тени ненависти или разочарования.{/n} "А ведь у вас были такие перспективы. Впрочем, я грешу на вашу наследственность... Прощайте, {name}. Обещаю, что каждое посеянное вами семя скверны будет найдено и искоренено. Свита, ликвидировать приговоренного еретика".

traits.locale_text: {n}There is not a shadow of hatred or disappointment on Calcazar's face.{/n} "And you were so promising, too. I blame your heredity... Farewell, {name}. I promise that I will find and destroy every single seed of corruption that you had sown. Retinue, execute the condemned heretic."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: {n}There is not a shadow of hatred or disappointment on Calcazar's face.{/n} "And you were so promising, too. I blame your heredity... Farewell, {name}. I promise that I will find and destroy every single seed of corruption that you had sown. Retinue, execute the condemned heretic."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: {n}There is not a shred of hatred or disappointment on Calcazar's face.{/n} "And you were so promising, too. I blame your heredity... Farewell, {name}. I vow to find and destroy every single seed of filth you have sown. Retinue, execute the condemned heretic."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: {n}There is not a shred of hatred or disappointment on Calcazar's face.{/n} "And you showed such promise, too. I blame your heredity... Farewell, {name}. I vow to find and destroy every single seed of corruption you have sown." {n}He glances at his retinue.{/n} "Execute the heretic."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: {n}There is not a shred of hatred or disappointment on Calcazar's face.{/n} "And you showed such promise, too. I blame your heredity... Farewell, {name}. I vow to find and destroy every single seed of corruption you have sown." {n}He glances at his retinue.{/n} "Execute the heretic."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}Le visage de Calcazar n'exprime nulle haine ou déception.{/n} « Vous étiez pourtant si {mf|prometteur|prometteuse}. Il faut sûrement mettre ça sur le compte de votre hérédité... Adieu, {name}. Je jure de trouver et de détruire jusqu'à la dernière graine de corruption que vous avez semée, {n}vous dit-il avant de se tourner vers son entourage.{/n} Exécutez l'hérétique. »
languages.original_text: {n}There is not a shred of hatred or disappointment on Calcazar's face.{/n} "And you showed such promise, too. I blame your heredity... Farewell, {name}. I vow to find and destroy every single seed of corruption you have sown." {n}He glances at his retinue.{/n} "Execute the heretic."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage de Calcazar n'exprime nulle haine ou déception.{/n} « Vous étiez pourtant si {mf|prometteur|prometteuse}. Il faut sûrement mettre ça sur le compte de votre hérédité... Adieu, {name}. Je jure de trouver et de détruire jusqu'à la dernière graine de corruption que vous avez semée, {n}vous dit-il, puis il se tourne vers son entourage.{/n} Exécutez l'hérétique. »
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}No hay ni rastro de odio ni decepción en la expresión de Calcazar.{/n} «Con todo el potencial que tenías. Debe de ser cosa de familia... Adiós, {name}. Juro encontrar y destruir cada una de las semillas de corrupción que has plantado». {n}Lanza una mirada a su séquito.{/n} «Ejecuten a{mf|l| la} hereje».
languages.original_text: {n}There is not a shred of hatred or disappointment on Calcazar's face.{/n} "And you showed such promise, too. I blame your heredity... Farewell, {name}. I vow to find and destroy every single seed of corruption you have sown." {n}He glances at his retinue.{/n} "Execute the heretic."

traits.locale_text: {n}No hay ni rastro de odio ni decepción en la expresión de Calcazar.{/n} «Con lo prometedor{mf||a} que eras. Debe de ser cosa de familia... Adiós, {name}. Juro destruir cada una de las semillas de corrupción que has plantado. Séquito, ejecuten a est{mf|e|a} maldit{mf|o|a} hereje».
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}卡尔卡扎的脸上没有任何仇恨或失望的意味。{/n}“你明明那么有前途，我只能怪罪于你的血脉了……永别了，{name}。我发誓，我会找到你播下的每颗腐化之种，彻底铲除它们。”{n}他瞥了一眼他的随行人员。{/n}“处决这个异端分子。”
languages.original_text: {n}There is not a shred of hatred or disappointment on Calcazar's face.{/n} "And you showed such promise, too. I blame your heredity... Farewell, {name}. I vow to find and destroy every single seed of corruption you have sown." {n}He glances at his retinue.{/n} "Execute the heretic."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡尔卡扎的脸上没有任何仇恨或失望的意味。{/n}“你明明那么有前途，我只能怪罪于你的血脉了……永别了，{name}。我发誓，我会找到你播下的每颗种子，彻底铲除它们。我的随从们，处决这个有罪的异端分子。”
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}In Calcazars Miene liegt kein Funken Hass oder Enttäuschung.{/n} "Und dabei hattet Ihr so viel Potenzial gezeigt. Ich gebe Eurer Herkunft die Schuld ... Lebt wohl, {name}. Ich schwöre, jeden einzelnen Samen der Verderbnis zu finden und zu zerstören, den Ihr ausgesät habt." {n}Er blickt zu seinem Gefolge.{/n} "Richtet {mf|den Ketzer|die Ketzerin} hin."
languages.original_text: {n}There is not a shred of hatred or disappointment on Calcazar's face.{/n} "And you showed such promise, too. I blame your heredity... Farewell, {name}. I vow to find and destroy every single seed of corruption you have sown." {n}He glances at his retinue.{/n} "Execute the heretic."

traits.locale_text: {n}In Calcazars Miene liegt kein Funken Hass oder Enttäuschung.{/n} "Und Ihr wart auch noch so vielversprechend. Ich gebe Eurer Herkunft die Schuld ... Lebt wohl, {name}. Ich schwöre, jeden einzigen Samen der Widerwärtigkeit zu finden und zu zerstören, den Ihr ausgesät habt. Gefolge, richtet {mf|den verurteilten Ketzer|die verurteilte Ketzerin} hin."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}カルカサルの顔には憎しみや失望は一片たりともなかった。{/n}「そして、あなたはとても将来性を示していた。私はあなたの承継を非難する…さらばだ、{name}。私はあなたが撒いた腐敗のすべての種子を見つけ出し、破壊することを誓おう」{n}彼は従者たちを見た。{/n}「異端者を処刑せよ」
languages.original_text: {n}There is not a shred of hatred or disappointment on Calcazar's face.{/n} "And you showed such promise, too. I blame your heredity... Farewell, {name}. I vow to find and destroy every single seed of corruption you have sown." {n}He glances at his retinue.{/n} "Execute the heretic."

traits.locale_text: {n}カルカサルの顔には憎しみや失望は一片たりともなかった。{/n}「そして、あなたはとても有望だった…有望すぎた。私はあなたの承継を非難する…さらばだ、{name}。私はあなたが撒いた汚れのすべての種子を見つけ出し、破壊することを誓おう。従者たちよ、異端者に死刑判決を執行せよ」
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}Calcazar'ın yüzünde hayal kırıklığı veya nefretten eser yok.{/n} "Umut vaadediyordun aslında ama soyuna veriyorum... Elveda {name}. Ektiğin tüm yozlaşma tohumlarını bulup yok edeceğime ant içiyorum." {n}Maiyetine bakıyor.{/n} "Kâfiri ortadan kaldırın."
languages.original_text: {n}There is not a shred of hatred or disappointment on Calcazar's face.{/n} "And you showed such promise, too. I blame your heredity... Farewell, {name}. I vow to find and destroy every single seed of corruption you have sown." {n}He glances at his retinue.{/n} "Execute the heretic."
